attributes.action: make smaller roads 30mph instead of national speed limit
attributes.additional_details: it’s incredibly dangerous for those small roads to have such a high speed limit , if someone comes round a corner at that speed it could cause a crash
attributes.background: Make smaller country rounds 30mph instead of 60/70mph.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Change the speed limit for single-carriageway rural roads from 60mph to 30mph
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/725877
